channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: OPEC+ Members Consider Delaying Production Increase, Delegates Say
item.description: OPEC+ members are debating delaying a production increase that was supposed to start next month amid concerns over weak oil prices, delegates in the p...

item.title: Russian lawmaker Butina calls US election meddling claims 'pure rubbish'
Should You Include REITs in Your Portfolio? And if So, Which Ones?
item.description: Homeowners and others looking to gain real-estate exposure aren’t getting the diversification they expect, research shows.

item.title: Marathon's Detroit refinery union workers go on strike
Temu's Parent, a Victim of Competition or Its Own Success?
item.description: PDD suddenly lost a third of its value following a cautious outlook. Its founder had briefly become China’s richest man.

item.title: France stocks lower at close of trade; CAC 40 down 0.98%
They're Breaking Every Retirement Rule to Be Off Now, Not Later
item.description: Some workers want to spread retirement throughout their careers, even if it means a smaller 401(k).

item.title: Zoomlion shares stay at Buy, Citi adjusts target amid weaker-than-expected results
Fears of Economic Slowdown Spark Stock-Market Selloff
item.description: The Dow industrials slid more than 600 points and the Nasdaq Composite shed 3.3%.

item.title: Belgium stocks higher at close of trade; BEL 20 up 0.36%
